nodes.text: Reog was the leader of the Reog's Regiment, one of the larger independent mercenary unit during the Galactic Civil War. His regiment struck a mining facility in a Wild Space system, but Lorka, a Hutt crime lord, hired a rival mercenary fleet to attack reog's fleet in retaliation. He and his regiment were then hired by Grruna Thu, Gamorrean leader of the Shrook Clan, to attack the Hakks, a rival clan, in retaliation for destroying their outpost on Gamorr. The mercenaries were ultimately overwhelmed in the battle.
